channel.title: Papers on Shota Saito
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Shota Saito

item.title: Joint Optimization of Convolutional Neural Network and Image Preprocessing Selection for Embryo Grade Prediction in In Vitro Fertilization
item.description: Kento Uchida, Shota Saito, Panca Dewi Pamungkasari, Yusei Kawai, Ita Fauzia Hanoum, Filbert Hilman Juwono and Shinichi Shirakawa: Joint Optimization of Convolutional Neural Network and Image Preprocessing Selection for Embryo Grade Prediction in In Vitro Fertilization, The 14th International Symposium on Visual Computing (ISVC 2019) (Accepted as oral presentation).

item.title: Controlling Model Complexity in Probabilistic Model-Based Dynamic Optimization of Neural Network Structures
item.description: Shota Saito and Shinichi Shirakawa: Controlling Model Complexity in Probabilistic Model-Based Dynamic Optimization of Neural Network Structures, In Artificial Neural Networks and Machine Learning – ICANN 2019: Deep Learning, Lecture Notes in Computer Science, vol 11728. Springer, Cham. ※ Acceptance Rate for Oral Presentation: 24.3% ≒ 120 / 494

item.title: Adaptive Stochastic Natural Gradient Method for One-Shot Neural Architecture Search
item.description: Youhei Akimoto, Shinichi Shirakawa, Nozomu Yoshinari, Kento Uchida, Shota Saito, and Kouhei Nishida: Adaptive Stochastic Natural Gradient Method for One-Shot Neural Architecture Search, Proceedings of the 36th International Conference on Machine Learning (ICML), Vol. 97 of PMLR, pp. 171-180 (2019). ※ Acceptance Rate: 22.6% ≒ 773 / 3424

item.title: ニューラルネットワークを用いたフォトニック結晶ナノレーザの構造最適化
item.description: 阿部遼太郎，武田太一，白鳥遼，白川真一，斉藤翔汰，馬場俊彦：ニューラルネットワークを用いたフォトニック結晶ナノレーザの構造最適化，応用物理学会春季講演会 (2019).

item.title: 機械学習を用いたフォトニック結晶ナノレーザのQ値向上
item.description: 武田太一，阿部遼太郎，白鳥遼，白川真一，斉藤翔汰，馬場俊彦：機械学習を用いたフォトニック結晶ナノレーザのQ値向上，応用物理学会春季講演会 (2019).

item.title: 粒子群最適化を用いたSiフォトニック結晶光偏向器の最適化
item.description: 白鳥遼，阿部遼太郎，武田太一，中田雅也，白川真一，斉藤翔汰，馬場俊彦：粒子群最適化を用いたSiフォトニック結晶光偏向器の最適化，応用物理学会春季講演会 (2019).

item.title: Parameterless Stochastic Natural Gradient Method for Discrete Optimization and its Application to Hyper-Parameter Optimization for Neural Network
item.description: Kouhei Nishida, Hernan Aguirre, Shota Saito, Shinichi Shirakawa, Youhei Akimoto: “Parameterless Stochastic Natural Gradient Method for Discrete Optimization and its Application to Hyper-Parameter Optimization for Neural Network”, preprint arXiv:1809.06517 (2018).

item.title: Dynamic Feature Construction for Neural Networks Using Probabilistic Model-Based Genetic Programming
item.description: Hirokazu Kobayashi, Shota Saito, Shinichi Shirakawa: “Dynamic Feature Construction for Neural Networks Using Probabilistic Model-Based Genetic Programming”, 2018 JPNSEC International Workshop on Evolutionary Computation, Shenzhen, China (2018).

item.title: Introducing a Penalty Term to Control Structure Complexity in Dynamic Optimization of Neural Network Structures
item.description: Shota Saito, Shinichi Shirakawa: “Introducing a Penalty Term to Control Structure Complexity in Dynamic Optimization of Neural Network Structures”, 2018 JPNSEC International Workshop on Evolutionary Computation, Shenzhen, China (2018).

item.title: Embedded Feature Selection Using Probabilistic Model-Based Optimization
item.description: Shota Saito, Shinichi Shirakawa, Youhei Akimoto: “Embedded Feature Selection Using Probabilistic Model-Based Optimization”, Student Workshop in Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference 2018 (GECCO 2018) , Kyoto, Japan, 15th-19th July (2018). (Best student paper nominated)

item.title: Information Geometric Optimizationを⽤いた埋め込み型特徴選択
item.description: 斉藤翔汰，白川真一：Information Geometric Optimizationを⽤いた埋め込み型特徴選択，進化計算シンポジウム2017，pp.77-84 (2017).

item.title: 適応的ノイズ分布を導入したDeep Neural Networkのための学習法
item.description: 斉藤翔汰，白川真一：適応的ノイズ分布を導入したDeep Neural Networkのための学習法，計測自動制御学会 システム・情報部門 第56回システム工学部会研究会，pp.26-32 (2017).
